errors.htmlContent: This field cannot contain HTML content.
errors.generic: An error occurred. Please attempt again at a later time.
errors.400: The server couldn't understand the request, please review and submit a valid request.
errors.401: Authentication failed. Please double-check your credentials and try again.
errors.403: Permission denied. Your current access level is insufficient for this operation.
errors.404: Oops, looks like you've hit a dead end. The resource you're after couldn't be found.
errors.500: Our server has encounter an internal error. Please try again at a later time.
errors.40001: Request failed due to validation errors. Please review and correct the provided data before resubmitting.
errors.40002: Password update failed. Please ensure your new password meets the specified requirements and try again.
errors.40003: Failed to send email. The provided email address appears to be invalid. Please double-check and try again.
errors.40004: Authentication failed. Please double-check your credentials and try again.
errors.40005: Request failed due to a violation of a unique constraint. Please ensure that the provided information is unique and try again.
errors.40006: Certain details in your request are incomplete. Please give it another try.
errors.40008: The entered password and the confirmed password do not match. Revise the password, update it, and attempt again.
errors.40009: Your attempt was unsuccessful multiple times. Please complete the ReCAPTCHA to proceed.
errors.40011: Access to this action is restricted. Kindly get in touch with your administrator for assistance.
errors.40012: The file you uploaded is too large. Please upload a different file and try once more.
errors.40013: You can only initiate three password recovery attempts per day.
errors.40014: The link for password recovery has expired.
errors.40015: Your new password matches your old one. Please choose a different password.
errors.40016: Your login session has ended. Kindly log in again.
errors.40017: Your login session has ended. Kindly log in again.
errors.40019: Full functionality will be available once your municipal approval is complete, typically within 5 business days. Please wait for confirmation to access all features.
errors.40020: We could not parse the CSV file
errors.40021: Invalid date format in CSV file
errors.40027: You have already confirmed your email.
errors.40025: Your account is not validated yet. Please check your email and confirm your email address to complete the registration process.
errors.40032: This email address is already in use.
errors.40036: One of the BSN or Pass numbers you entered already exists.
errors.40037: The amount you entered is violating the eligibile price range.
errors.40038: This email address is not valid.

alerts.passwordAlertRequirements1: Password must be at least 8 characters.
alerts.passwordAlertRequirements2: Include at least one capital letter, one number and one symbol.
